statements: UPDATE ab_testing_messages SET audience_size=1000, design='B' WHERE test_id=1;
UPDATE ab_testing_messages SET conversion_rate=0.75, message='Updated Message' WHERE test_id=2;
UPDATE ab_testing_messages SET audience_size = 1000, conversion_rate = 0.15 WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE ab_testing_messages SET message = 'New Message', design = 'Modern Design' WHERE test_id = 2;
UPDATE marketing_messages SET message_text = 'New Message Text' WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE test_results SET variant = 'B' WHERE test_id = '888e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE marketing_messages SET message_text = 'New message text', timestamp = NOW() WHERE message_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE test_results SET variant = 'B', conversion_rate = 0.75, test_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE test_id = 'a7346942-ffbb-11ec-80a0-7665be2399b9';
UPDATE brand_messages SET design = 'new design', variant = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET conversion_rate = 0.75 WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE brand_messages SET message = 'New Message', variant = 2 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET conversion_rate = 0.75 WHERE group_id = 2 AND message_id = 3 AND design_id = 1;
UPDATE marketing_message SET message_text = 'New message text', message_type = 'Promotional' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE design_options SET design_type = 'Minimalist', group_id = 2 WHERE design_id = 3;
UPDATE marketing_message SET message_text = 'New message text', message_type = 'Promotional' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE design_options SET design_name = 'Updated Design', design_type = 'New Type', design_image = 'updated_image.jpg' WHERE design_id = 3;
UPDATE MarketingMessages SET message_text = 'New Message Text' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE ATestGroup SET test_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE group_id = 3;
UPDATE MarketingMessages SET message_text = 'New message text', message_design = 'Updated design' WHERE message_id = 1;
UPDATE TestResults SET conversion_rate = 0.75 WHERE group_id = (SELECT group_id FROM ATestGroup WHERE test_date = '2022-01-01');
